dict.acceptation: 可能的；适合的；有希望的；

sent.orig: Smiling people appear more, are more likely to promoted, and more likely to be approached.
sent.trans: 肌肉群通过微笑可以达到修整容颜的效果，能让人们看上去更年轻。

sent.orig: Smiling people appear more confident, are more likely to be promoted, and more likely be approached.
sent.trans: 微笑的人看上去更加自信，更有可能被晋升，更容易让人接近。

sent.orig: Markets are likely to be in limbo, with volatility in ranges likely this week.
sent.trans: 市场可能会处于不明朗的状态，在本星期于不同范围内波动。

sent.orig: Smiling people appear more confident, are more likely to bepromoted, and more likely to be approached.
sent.trans: 微笑的人看上去更加自信，升职的可能性更大，更容易让人接近。

sent.orig: The disease is likely to spread.
